817260.name: Rise of Insanity - Original Soundtrack
817260.description:
Rise of Insanity Official Soundtrack composed by Wojciech "Boutcher" Śliwa is a music way of telling a story about dr Dowell's journey through the human mind, which is slowly going to insane. In his debut soundtrack, Boutcher wanted to show two faces of this story - a tragedy of a man, who lost his wife and child in unknown circumstances and misery of a family, which can't handle with illness of the loved person.

In the final song, Iwona Śliwa - Boutcher's wife - plays the role of Steven's wife and tells this sad story from a suffering wife point of view.
817260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
